description:
Join us at Cookpad HQ in Bristol this month for a special festive edition with mince pies, a cheesy festive playlist and fantastic talks.

Schedule

18:00 - 18:40 - Arrive, grab a drink, some delicious locally supplied food and have a chat with fellow attendees

18:40 - "You Can't Be What You Can't See: Fact or Myth?" by Tiffany Dawson

19:20 - "What's in Santa's sack for Ruby this Christmas" by Paul Leader

20:00 - We aim to wrap all the talks up by 20:00 but there is still time for another drink, some more food and discussion with fellow attendees

Slack

If you'd like to join us on Slack please join https://bathruby-for-slackers.herokuapp.com and find us in the #south-west-ruby channel

Notices

Please let us know in the comments of the event if you have any specific food allergies, dietary or access requirements so we can be sure to best accommodate everyone!
title: South West Ruby #23
